welcome:
Welcome to Needs and Resources Bot!
Type /help to see all commands.
Use the keyboard below for quick access.
help:
Available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/help - Show this help message
/need - Add a need
/listneeds - List your needs
/deleteneed <number> - Delete a need
/resource - Add a resource
/listresources - List your resources
/deleteresource <number> - Delete a resource
promptNeed: Please send the description of your need.
promptResource: Please send the description of your resource.
